text: akave, evarenum tankal manaivikalai(t tan) taykku oppittuk kuriya pinnar, avarkalitam tirumpa (cerntukolla) virumpinal, avviruvarum oruvarai oruvar totuvatarku munnatakave (ivvaru oppittuk kuriya kurrattirkup parikaramaka) or atimaiyai vitutalai ceyyaventum. Itai (allah) unkalukku upatecam ceykiran. Allah ninkal ceypavarrai nankaripavan avan
